descriptionHtml:
I have attempted to add Battlehorn to skyrim! I wanted a close replica and came up with this, before I gave up. This file is incomplete but I hope someone will pick it up in the near future and make a close replica to my favorite home from oblivion. If my dream comes true and somebody does pick this up, Please contact me when you are done my email is yourking77@gmail.com. The project itself is located in the middle of the lake north of Lakeview manor, follow the river south west of riverwood. I gave up on the inside so the exterior is nearly complete.

What I was attempting. (and what I hope someone will pick up)
-A complete reconstuction of the original fighters stronghold dlc from oblivion.
-stock textures from Skyrim. (no custom ones if you can avoid it)
-I do want retextured flags and armor. (I used ones from solitude)
-I would like somebody to make custom .nif mesh files. (I don't know how)
-Working furniture. (from weapon racks to chairs and mannequins I want all the furniture to be interactive.)
-I also wanted a custom back story without changing the castle. (something so it makes sense why it is in Skyrim)
-beautified surroundings.

Because I am not as experienced as some of the other modder's out there I do not know how to make NIF. files and so I used all in game static meshes, I tried to hid the seems the best I could and for what it is, it is good, but the interior is near impossible to complete that way so i am asking for help.
author: Carter_Baker
